title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the basics of C programming in this comprehensive course. Explore topics like syntax, data types, and basic algorithms while building a strong foundation in programming.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Discover the fascinating world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques with this in-depth course. Master fundamental concepts and strategies used by programmers and computer scientists.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Take your C++ skills to the next level with a focus on Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Explore advanced topics and apply your knowledge to solve complex problems.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Build a solid foundation in essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks. Learn their applications and practical use in software development.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts using Python. Through hands-on projects and examples, gain proficiency in OOP principles and best practices.

title: AWS
description: Embark on a journey to discover Amazon Web Services (AWS) and its powerful cloud computing capabilities. Learn to deploy applications and manage resources on the AWS platform.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Dive into the world of cloud computing, exploring various services and deployment models. Gain a comprehensive understanding of cloud technologies and their applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the MySQL database management system and SQL query language. Learn to design, implement, and manage databases effectively for a wide range of applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Sharpen your problem-solving skills through a series of challenging exercises and real-world scenarios. Enhance your critical thinking and logical reasoning abilities.
